title: Tobacco smokers could gain 86 million years of life if they switch to vaping, study finds

title_detail.value: Tobacco smokers could gain 86 million years of life if they switch to vaping, study finds

summary: Up to 6.6 million cigarette smokers will live substantially longer if cigarette smoking is replaced by vaping over a ten-year period, calculates a research team. In all, cigarette smokers who switch to e-cigarettes could live 86.7 million more years with policies that encourage cigarette smokers to switch completely to e-cigarettes.
